name: fpx
description: Local development debugging interface for Hono apps, powered by OpenTelemetry

scripts.build:fpx-studio: npm run clean:fpx-studio && npm run build:api && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: npm run --workspace frontend build && cp -r frontend/dist/* api/dist
scripts.clean:fpx-studio: npm run clean:api && npm run clean:frontend
